script:
;;正解:1天叢雲剣
# script "lisp"
# background %(wayback_background)s
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# fadein "black" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
@
帰り道－

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# bgm "stop"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

@
ふと、
傍らを歩く彼女が足を止めた…

# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "sad"
# voice 1004 "kusanagi_0002"
@草薙剣
そちよ
余は常々言っておるが…

# voice 1004 "kusanagi_0010"
# face %(unit_a)s "angry"
@草薙剣
大事にされないと
ものすごく拗ねる！

# voice 1004 "kusanagi_0003"
# face %(unit_a)s "normal"
@草薙剣
ゆえにそちは
余のことを深く理解し
丁重に扱わねばならぬのだ

# voice 1004 "kusanagi_0005"
# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
@草薙剣
どれ、どれくらい余のことを
知っておるか
試してみるとしよう！

# face %(unit_a)s "normal"
@草薙剣
余のキラーズ『草薙剣』の
異名はわかるかの？

# se "SE_0734"
# select "天叢雲剣" "select_label_1" "天羽々斬" "select_label_2" "七星剣" "select_label_3"
余のキラーズ『草薙剣』の
異名はわかるかの？

# label "select_label_1"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_2"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_3"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# sestop "SE_0734"
# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
